summary: A pytest-based test suite for the Anthropic language model integration, providing fixtures for client setup and covering multimodal image handling, system message creation and caching, and placeholder tests for streaming behavior in both synchronous and asynchronous contexts.
business_intent: Validate and ensure the correctness, performance, and reliability of Anthropic LLM features—such as multimodal input processing, system message management, and streaming responses—within the application to support robust AI-driven functionality.
